title: Emergency Repair Work on Eastern Freeway
description: Critical repair work will be carried out on the Eastern Freeway between Orange Gate and Ghatkopar from February 20th to February 25th, 2024, from 11 PM to 5 AM. Expect significant delays. Please use alternative routes.
author: Rajesh Sharma

title: Introduction of New Property Tax Assessment System
description: The BMC is launching a new, transparent online system for property tax assessment and payment effective April 1st, 2024. All citizens are requested to update their property details on the portal by March 31st.
author: Priya Patil

title: Public Hearing for Coastal Road Project Phase-II
description: A public hearing regarding the environmental impact of Coastal Road Project Phase-II (Nariman Point to Kandivali) will be held on March 5th, 2024, at 11 AM in the Town Hall, Fort. All concerned citizens and stakeholders are invited.
author: Vikram Mehta

title: Water Supply Interruption in Western Suburbs
description: Water supply will be temporarily interrupted in Bandra, Khar, and Santa Cruz areas on February 22nd, 2024, from 10 AM to 6 PM for pipeline maintenance work. Please store water accordingly.
author: Anil Joshi

title: GST Registration Camp for Small Businesses
description: A special GST registration camp for small businesses and shopkeepers will be organized at Andheri West Ward Office from February 25th to 28th, 2024. Free consultation and assistance will be provided.
author: Meena Desai

title: Successfully Resolved: Water Logging Issue at Sion Circle
description: The chronic water logging issue at Sion Circle has been successfully resolved with the completion of the new drainage pipeline. We thank citizens for their patience during the work.
author: Amit Deshpande

title: Clean-Up Drive at Juhu Beach This Sunday
description: Join us for a mega clean-up drive at Juhu Beach this Sunday, February 25th, from 7 AM to 9 AM. Gloves and bags will be provided. Let's keep our city clean!
author: Current User

title: New Electric Buses Added to BEST Fleet
description: 50 new electric buses have been added to the BEST fleet on routes in South Mumbai. This is a step towards a greener and quieter Mumbai.
author: Sanjay Kumar

title: Tree Plantation Drive in Aarey Colony
description: 5000 saplings planted in Aarey Colony as part of the green Mumbai initiative. Citizens participated enthusiastically in the drive.
author: Green Mumbai Initiative

title: Mobile Health Clinic Launched in Dharavi
description: New mobile health clinic started services in Dharavi area. Provides free basic health checkups and medicines. Operating from 9 AM to 5 PM daily.
author: Dr. Rajiv Malhotra

title: Foot Over Bridge Repair Completed at Dadar Station
description: The foot over bridge at Dadar Railway Station (West) has been repaired and strengthened. Now safe for public use with enhanced safety features.
author: Bridge Department

title: Anti-Dengue Fogging Drive in Eastern Suburbs
description: Comprehensive anti-dengue fogging drive being conducted in Eastern suburbs to prevent mosquito breeding. Citizens are advised to cooperate and remove stagnant water from their premises.
author: Health Inspector

title: Thane Metro 4-4A Corridor Improves Thane-Mumbai Connectivity
description: Metro 4 and 4A corridor project in Thane to reduce congestion on Ghodbunder Highway; trial run for Cadbury Junction-Gaimukh stretch; passenger service expected by December-end pending approvals.

title: Flyover Proposed on LBS Marg to Ease Traffic Congestion
description: BMC plans a 4.2 km flyover from Kalpana Talkies (Kurla West) to Pankhe Shah Baba Dargah (Ghatkopar West) to ease traffic congestion on LBS Marg. Design complicated by overlapping existing infrastructure like Metro & MRIDC bridge.

title: AVGC-XR Policy 2025 Approved by Maharashtra Cabinet
description: State cabinet approves policy for Animation, Visual Effects, Gaming, Comics & Extended Reality (AVGC-XR Policy 2025) to generate jobs and attract investment.

title: Startup, Entrepreneurship & Innovation Policy 2025
description: Maharashtra Startup Policy 2025 cleared: support for 1,25,000 entrepreneurs & 50,000 startups; includes Rs-500 crore Maha-Fund, incubation infrastructure, new Innovation City in Navi Mumbai etc.

title: Mumbai-Ahmedabad Bullet Train Underground Tunnel Breakthrough: Shilphata-Ghansoli 4.88 km
description: Major milestone in Mumbai-Ahmedabad bullet train project: 4.88 km tunnel between Shilphata and Ghansoli achieved.

title: Replantation of Trees at Bhandup Water Treatment Plant using Root-Ball Technique
description: 438 trees replanted on-site at Bhandup treatment complex using root-ball technique with 100% survival; plus compensatory plantation near Tansa Lake.

title: Inauguration of Mumbai International Cruise Terminal (MICT) at Indira Dock
description: Largest cruise terminal in India inaugurated; 72 counters; capacity for 5 ships; handles up to one million passengers/year.

title: Transport Dept Launches Safety Initiatives for Female Passengers
description: Includes mobile app "Black Spot", emergency services integration, WhatsApp info service, AI-vehicle monitoring etc., pilot in Mumbai/Thane region.

title: Centre Doubles Budget for City Rail Transport, Allocates Rs 1,777 Crore
description: Union Budget 2025-26 increases allocation for Mumbai Urban Transport Projects (MUTP) to Rs 1,777 crore (then matching State funds) for improvement of suburban rail, station redevelopment, etc.

title: Fraud Case: Mumbai Businessman Duped in IAS Promise Scam
description: Businessman Irshad Khan duped of Rs 60 lakh by people promising to make his son an IAS officer; police investigation underway.

title: Policy to Grant Occupation Certificates (OCs) to ~25,000 Buildings
description: Maharashtra govt will frame a policy from Oct 2 to allow 25,000+ housing societies/buildings in Mumbai (constructed under BMC, MHADA, SRA etc.) to obtain occupation certificates, simplifying legal/technical hurdles, maybe waiving penalties.

title: Sharp Rise in Malaria, Chikungunya & Hepatitis Cases; BMC Steps Up Control Measures
description: From Jan-Sep 2025, Mumbai saw increase in malaria (to ~6,277), chikungunya (542), hepatitis (913) cases vs same period last year. Govt calls for preventive steps.

title: Maharashtra Housing Policy 2025 – 50 Lakh Homes in 10 Years
description: State govt launches Housing Policy 2025 with target of building 50 lakh homes in 10 years, especially focussing on Economically Weaker Sections, LIG, MIG. To expand existing institutional frameworks and give incentives.

title: BMC plans 4.2 km Flyover on LBS Marg (Kurla-West to Ghatkopar-West)
description: To ease traffic congestion on LBS Marg, BMC plans new four-lane, two-way flyover from Kalpana Talkies (Kurla West) to Pankhe Shah Baba Dargah (Ghatkopar West). Design is complex due to overlapping metro and MRIDC infrastructure.

title: Metro 4-4A (Thane) Corridor Improves Thane-Mumbai Connectivity
description: Metro 4 and 4A corridor project in Thane will reduce congestion on Ghodbunder Highway & improve connectivity with Mumbai. Trial run for Cadbury Junction-Gaimukh stretch planned; passenger service by December (pending approvals).

title: Govt to Create Corpus Fund for Medical Treatments Over ₹5 Lakh
description: Maharashtra Govt will set up a fund to cover expensive treatments (organ transplants etc.) costing more than ₹5 lakh. Also expansion of AB-PMJAY / MJPJAY with more procedures (from 1,356 to 2,399).

title: Proposal for Native Urban Forest Along Mumbai Coastal Road Reclaimed Strip
description: Climate scientists, architects, and citizens propose converting ~100-acre strip of reclaimed land from Nepean Sea Road to Worli into a native urban forest to boost climate resilience, provide green public space.

title: Mumbai Govt Offices Closed; Private Firms Asked to Work from Home Amid Red Alert Rain
description: Due to very heavy to extremely heavy rainfall warnings, BMC ordered govt and semi-govt offices closed for safety, asked private firms to allow work from home.

title: Green Mumbai Summit 2025 – Roadmap for Net-Zero & Climate Resilience
description: Leaders from govt, industry, academia gathered in Green Mumbai Summit 2025 to chart steps for climate resilient & sustainable Mumbai.

title: Maharashtra Budget 2025: Industrial Policy for ₹40 Lakh Crore Investment, 50 Lakh Jobs
description: Budget 2025 announced new industrial policy aiming to attract ₹40 lakh crore investment and create 50 lakh jobs. Also proposed third airport near Vadhvan Port to be operational by 2030.

title: Maharashtra Housing Policy 2025 – 'My House, My Right'
description: State approves Housing Policy 2025 aimed at ensuring affordable and adequate housing for all citizens. Key goals: build 50 lakh houses in 10 years, with 35 lakh in first 5 years; revive stalled real-estate & slum redevelopment; provide incentives like reduced stamp duty for senior living, single window clearances, etc.

title: Maharashtra Startup, Entrepreneurship & Innovation Policy 2025
description: New policy targeting to nurture 1,25,000 entrepreneurs and 50,000 startups in next 5 years. Includes support via incubators, seed funding, fund-of-funds, IPR reimbursements, infrastructure development etc.

title: Centralised Portal for All Government Schemes in Maharashtra
description: Government to launch a unified portal to consolidate multiple personal databases to identify citizens' eligibility for schemes (caste, income, gender, disability, geography). Aim: streamline scheme administration, reduce duplicates, improve direct benefit transfers.

title: Transport Department Launches App & Systems for Female Passenger Safety
description: Multiple initiatives including "Black Spot" app to alert about accident-prone areas, integrating emergency services, AI-based vehicle monitoring, and WhatsApp service for vehicle info. Pilot in Mumbai / Thane region.

title: Mumbai International Cruise Terminal (MICT) Inauguration
description: Prime Minister inaugurates India's largest cruise terminal at Indira Dock. Terminal has 72 counters, designed for 5 ships, handling up to one million passengers annually.

title: Flyover Proposed on LBS Marg (Kurla-West to Ghatkopar-West)
description: BMC plans a 4.2 km long, 4-lane flyover from Kalpana Talkies, Kurla West to Pankhe Shah Baba Dargah, Ghatkopar West to ease traffic congestion. Design to consider existing metro & other infrastructure.

title: Mumbai Monorail to get Metro-style CBTC Signalling System
description: To improve safety and reliability, monorail to adopt CBTC (Communications Based Train Control), used in Metro lines, enabling real-time monitoring and automatic braking.

title: Metro-3 Aqua Line Full Route Potential Inauguration on Dussehra 2025
description: Mumbai's first underground metro (Metro-3 / Aqua Line) final phase (27 stations) may be inaugurated on Dussehra, closing remaining gaps and enabling full route operations.

title: Navi Mumbai Metro Line-1 crosses 1 Crore Ridership in Under 2 Years
description: Belapur to Pendhar metro reached 1 crore riders as of September 6, 2025. Service every 10 mins peak, 15 mins off-peak; fare between ₹10-₹30.

title: Swachhta Hi Seva: Cleanliness Campaign in Navi Mumbai
description: Swachhta Hi Seva campaign by NMMC from Sep 17 to Oct 2, 2025. Public cleaning drives, tree plantation, back-lane cleaning, participation from school children, NGOs etc.

title: MoU with Cambridge for School Education Upgrade
description: Maharashtra government signs MoU with Cambridge University Press & Assessment India to enhance quality of government and aided school education via international-level teacher training, curriculum reforms, climate education modules, and digital literacy initiatives.

title: AVGC-XR Policy Approved by Maharashtra Cabinet
description: State cabinet approves Animation, Visual Effects, Gaming, Comics & Extended Reality policy to position Mumbai as a hub, with target of 2 lakh jobs and ₹50,000 crore investment by 2050.

title: Mobile App & Safety Initiatives for Female Passengers Launched
description: Transport Department launches 'Black Spot' app that alerts drivers about accident-prone areas, integrates emergency services & women's helpline; plus other tech-tools (WhatsApp service, AI-vehicle monitoring) to improve vehicle safety and administration.

title: Modernisation of Dry Waste Centres by BMC
description: BMC to revamp 10 of its 41 operational dry waste segregation/processing centres, starting with Wadala, Marol-Andheri, Dahisar East, and Borivali West; mechanisation (conveyor belts etc.) to reduce load on dumping grounds.

title: FOB Connecting Metro 3 CSMIA-T2 Station to Terminal 2
description: 100-metre Foot Over Bridge (FOB) inaugurated connecting the Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj International Airport Terminal 2 with the Metro 3 station (Lift Entry/Exit A1), reducing walking distance and easing last-mile connectivity.

title: Phase 2A of Metro 3 (BKC-Worli) Inaugurated
description: Chief Minister inaugurates Phase 2A of Metro 3 (Aqua Line) from BKC to Worli, 9 km and 6 stations; extension aiding east-west connectivity, reducing commute times.

title: NCMC Card Launched for Metro 3
description: RuPay National Common Mobility Card (NCMC) launched enabling 'tap & travel' for Metro 3 commuters; interoperable with other metro lines and bus services.

title: Mumbai-Ahmedabad Bullet Train Tunnel Breakthrough
description: A 4.88 km underground tunnel between Shilphata and Ghansoli achieved in the Mumbai-Ahmedabad high-speed rail project.

title: Swasth Nari, Sashakt Parivar Campaign in Mumbai-North
description: As part of BMC's 'Swasth Nari, Sashakt Parivar' campaign: mammography units deployed in slums of Mumbai-North; nutritious food for pregnant women; maternal and newborn health monitored.

title: New Signalling System for Monorail to Improve Safety
description: Mumbai Monorail to adopt metro-style CBTC signalling (Communications Based Train Control) so that real-time monitoring and automatic braking can prevent accidents.

title: गिरणी कामगारांसाठी घरे, मुंबई बाहेर गेलेल्या मराठी लोकांसाठी परतण्याची योजना
description: महाराष्ट्र सरकारने घोषणा केली आहे की 35 लाख परवडणारी घरे बांधली जातील आणि मुंबई बाहेर गेलेल्या मराठी लोकांना परतवण्यास प्रयत्न होय. पुनर्विकास प्रकल्पांना गती दिली जाईल. Up-CM एकनाथ शिंदे यांनी विधानसभेत याची माहिती दिली.

title: रुग्णांना Unique ID योजनेंतर्गत माहिती सहज उपलब्ध होईल
description: राज्य सरकारने आरोग्यसेवा सुधारण्यासाठी एक ठोस पाऊल घेतले आहे: प्रत्येक रुग्णाला एक Unique ID मिळेल ज्याद्वारे त्यांच्या आजाराचा इतिहास व इतर वैयक्तिक माहिती रुग्णालयांना एका क्लिकवर मिळेल. त्यामुळे आरोग्य सेवेत पारदर्शकता आणि सुविधा वाढेल.

title: महेश मांजरेकर यांची प्रतिक्रिया: "शिवाजी पार्कात मराठी माणूस उरलाच नाहीयेत"
description: मराठी अभिनेता-निर्देशक महेश मांजरेकर यांनी मुंबईतील मराठी लोकसंख्येचा घटता आढळ आल्याबद्दल खंत व्यक्त केली आहे. त्यांनी सांगितले की, दादर, परळ, लालबाग या पारंपरिक मराठी भागांमध्ये आता मराठी माणसांचे अस्तित्व कमी दिसतेय.

title: LBS Marg वर फळीओवर बनवण्याची योजना, ट्रॅफिक कमी होणार
description: BMC ने Kurla West ते Ghatkopar West या मार्गावर ४.२ कि.मी. फ्लायओव्हर बांधण्याचा प्रस्ताव मांडला आहे, LBS Marg च्या जाम समस्येवर उपाय म्हणून. Design मध्ये Metro आणि MRIDC च्या अस्तित्वाला ध्यान देण्यात आले आहे.

title: दादर स्थानकात बस लोकलमधून उतरत असलेल्या विद्यार्थिनीला छेडछाड; ६२ वर्षीय वृद्ध अटक
description: मुंबई दादर स्टेशनवर एका १९ वर्षीय विद्यार्थिनीशी लोकल ट्रेनमधून उतरतानाच छेडछाड झाली. या प्रकरणात ६२ वर्षाच्या पुरुषाला पोलिसांनी अटक केली आहे. घटना गर्दीत घडली. सुरक्षा वाढीसाठी स्थानकांवर लक्ष देणे गरजेचे असल्याची चर्चा.

title: IIM मुंबईचा विस्तार नवी मुंबई-पुण्यात; वित्तीय शिक्षण केंद्र प्रस्तावित
description: IIM मुंबईने नवी मुंबईत आर्थिक शिक्षण केंद्र स्थापनेचा प्रस्ताव मांडला आहे आणि पुण्यात मानवबळ प्रशिक्षण केंद्राचे मागणी आहे. हा उपक्रम प्रशिक्षण व कौशल्य विकासासाठी महत्त्वाचा ठरेल.

title: महायुति सरकारचा दावा: BMC व सर्व नगरपालिकांमध्ये भगवा झेंडा फडकणार
description: मुख्यमंत्री एकनाथ शिंदे यांनी महायुति गठबंधनाच्या नेतृत्वाखाली येत्या नगर निकाय निवडणुकांमध्ये BMC सह महाराष्ट्रातील सर्व नगरपालिकांमध्ये विजय मिळेल असा दावा केला आहे. निवडणुकींच्या तोंडावर हा राजनीतिक विदारक शब्द झाला आहे.

title: ठाणे-मुंबई कनेक्टिव्हिटी सुधारण्याचा Metro 4-4A प्रकल्प
description: ठाण्यातील Metro 4 आणि 4A कॉरिडॉर प्रकल्प आगामी असून Ghodbunder Highwayवरील ट्रॅफिक कमी करण्यासाठी आणि मुंबईच्या पूर्वीच्या व पश्चिमेकडच्या उपनगरांचे जाळे सुधारण्यासाठी महत्वाचा आहे. Cadbury Junction-Gaimukh दरम्यान ट्रायल रन होण्याची शक्यता.

title: मराठी कर्मचारी से बिहारी मैनेजर का मानसिक उत्पीड़न
description: मुंबई के साउथ में एक कंपनी में, बिहारी मैनेजर लगातार मराठी कर्मचारी से कहना शुरू कर दिया कि "एक बिहारी सब पे भारी"- सी बातें होती हैं। शिवसेना उबट के कार्यकर्ताओं ने इस मामले में हस्तक्षेप किया।

title: बिहारी छोरा का भयानक कांड: 11 Insta Accounts व 13,500 लड़कियों के फोटो
description: मुंबई की मराठी लड़कियों से जुड़ा एक स्कैंडल सामने आया है जहाँ आरोपी ने कई इंस्टाग्राम अकाउंट बनाये और हजारों फोटो इकट्ठे किये। आरोप है कि वो मानसिक शोषण भी हुआ।

policy_name: नवीन संस्कृती धोरण / New Cultural Policy
description: महाराष्ट्र सरकारने नवीन संस्कृती धोरण मंजूर केलं आहे ज्याअंतर्गत सर्व शाळांमध्ये ४ वर्षांसाठी मराठी अनिवार्य शिक्षण, सरकारी व अर्ध-सरकारी संस्थांमध्ये मराठी वेबसाईट्स अनिवार्य करणे, आणि लोककला, नाट्य, सिनेमा, नृत्य, लोकसंगीत यांसारख्या कलात्मक व सांस्कृतिक विभागांना प्रोत्साहन देणे समाविष्ट आहे.

policy_name: मराठी शाळांमध्ये मुख्य विषय म्हणून अनिवार्य करणे / Making Marathi core subject in all schools
description: शिक्षण विभागाने आदेश दिला आहे की २०२५-२६ पासून सर्व माध्यमांतील आणि सर्व बोर्डांच्या शाळांमध्ये मराठी हा मुख्य विषय म्हणून शिकवायचा आणि गुणांवर आधारित मूल्यांकन करायचे; कोविड काळातील काही सवलती समाप्त होतील.

policy_name: तीन भाषा धोरण — हिंदी तिसरी भाषा / Three-language policy including Hindi as optional/mandatory
description: महाराष्ट्र सरकारने असा निर्णय घेतला की मराठी व इंग्रजी माध्यमाच्या शाळांमध्ये १ ते ५ वर्गांमध्ये हिंदी तिसरी भाषा म्हणून शिकवावी; परंतु काही GRs रद्द करून या धोरणाचा पुनरावलोकन करण्यासाठी समिती नेमण्यात आली आहे.

policy_name: सार्वजनिक कार्यालयांमध्ये मराठी बोली अनिवार्य / Marathi mandatory in govt offices
description: महाराष्ट्र सरकारने GR जारी केला आहे की सरकारी कार्यालयांमध्ये, अर्ध-सरकारी कार्यालयात, स्थानिक स्वराज्य संस्थांमध्ये काम करणाऱ्या सर्व कर्मचाऱ्यांना मराठी बोलायला लागेल; जर एखादा कर्मचारी मराठीत बोलत नसेल तर विभागप्रमुख म्हणून तक्रार करण्याचा रास्ता देण्यात येईल.

policy_name: शिक्षकांसाठी मराठी मूलभूत ज्ञान अनिवार्य / Basic Marathi knowledge mandatory for school staff
description: शिक्षण मंत्री दादाजी भुसे यांनी सांगितले की सर्व माध्यमांच्या शाळांमधील शिक्षक व स्टाफला मराठीचे मूलभूत ज्ञान असणे आवश्यक आहे, खासकरून शाळांमध्ये मराठी विषय शिकवण्यासाठी.

policy_name: कलात्मक सांस्कृतिक वारसा जतन / Classical Marathi Language Day
description: राज्य सरकारने आदेश दिला आहे की दरवर्षी ३ ऑक्टोबरला 'अभिजात मराठी भाषा दिवस' म्हणून साजरा करावा, मराठी भाषेच्या वारशाचा संवर्धन व्हावा, तसेच त्या आठवड्यात संबंधित शैक्षणिक व सांस्कृतिक कार्यक्रम होतील.
